Transcription for 1215431

I'm a very social butterfly. I like going out meeting people but I'm finding it
really difficult here. There hasn't been anyone that I've felt really
comfortable with and who would get me and who likes to go out for a meal, maybe
go to a pub for a drink. That's another thing that I am looking for in a person
is someone who likes to go not necessarily get totally and utterly
annihilated but someone who likes to have a drink, social drink. Someone who
likes to have a laugh, has a sense of humour that's always important and yes
someone just to have fun with.
